text: Simone Smith is a Canadian film and television editor, who won the Canadian Screen Award for Best Editing at the 7th Canadian Screen Awards in 2019 for her work on the film Firecrackers."Les Québécois remportent plus de la moitié des trophées à l'avant-gala des prix Écrans canadiens". Ici Radio-Canada, March 31, 2019. She was previously nominated in the same category at the 6th Canadian Screen Awards in 2018 for Never Steady, Never Still."Canadian Screen Awards: ‘Breadwinner’ Up for Best Picture, 5 More Noms". Animation World Magazine, January 16, 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Canadian film editors Category:Best Editing Genie and Canadian Screen Award winners Category:Living people Category:Women film editors Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Simone Smith (Canadian editor)
